item.description: CONTAINED Brush Fire; INC#1697; 10:11PM; 12100 W Osborne St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HSgyob; #HansenDam; It took 50 firefighters 40 minutes to extinguish several brush fires in the Hansen Dam area that totaled (combined) approximately one acre. No reported injuries. Update Physical Rescue; INC#0589; 10:25AM; 3174 N Deronda Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xPD0JQ; #HollywoodHills; Firefighters extricated one patient from an overturned vehicle approximately 20 feet down an embankment, which came to rest on or near a multi-story residential structure. Occupants of the structure have been safely evacuated. It is unknown if the structure has been compromised. Firefighter-paramedics transported one elderly female to a local hospital in fair condition. Nothing further. ; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E227 E261 E27 E52 E76 E82 EM5 HR3 RA52 RA76 T27 T61 UR88; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

Physical Rescue; INC#0589; 09:38AM; 3174 N Deronda Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xPD0JQ; Hollywood Hills; One vehicle over the side, approximately 40 feet down. Firefighters are preparing to extricate one patient.; FS 82; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; BC5 E227 E261 E27 E52 E76 E82 EM5 HR3 RA52 RA76 T27 T61 UR88; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1108; 04:47PM; 7801 N Vicky Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Ofh2He; #WestHills; Firefighters arrived to find an auto and attached garage engulfed in flames, spreading to the home by way of the attic. Firefighters quickly deployed hose lines inside the home to prevent further damage. It took 32 firefighters 22 minutes to access, confine, and extinguish the flames. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 106; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC17 E104 E105 E106 E293 E305 E73 RA104 T105 T93; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

title.a: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire 06/21/2022 INC#0126

item.description: Knockdown - Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#0126; 03:01AM; 1667 W Washington Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3HF5Jpm; #PicoUnion; *Address Corrected to 1667* Eighty-two LAFD Firefighters took just 32 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire within a 100' x 100' one-story commercial building housing "American Textile Maintenance", a textile laundry and rental service. No injury.
